THURSDAY partially prohibited by the market from 7 to 15 hours.

Nice campsite near the beach. ACSI 22 euros per day including electricity. Sufficient and clean sanitary facilities. Friendly staff. Trash cans everywhere. Gray and black water in only 2 spots so a walk at times. Lots of water points. sandy surface. Storage shop and swimming pool open only in high season. good value for money. nice terrace next to the entrance, we good at the price but ok...
36€ Van 13€ Electricity 04/23

title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - P.º Marítimo de la Puntilla

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 53A Avenida Río San Pedro
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 53A Avenida Río San Pedro
description: Good parking in Valdelagrana, in a quiet and wide avenue. Here we go more unnoticed than in the parking bags on the beach. It is better to park here, it is 200m from the beach, but the place is very quiet and spacious. school, nobody is bothered here parked. In the surrounding streets there are also AC parked. As I say, better around here than in the first line to go unnoticed.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle la Playa
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle la Playa
description:
Lots of space but not very nice. it's close to a lot of things but right inbetween high building compound.
Free parking with plenty of space. On weekends it is quite full, during the week there is no problem. On the beachfront with many bars and various services. The area is quite safe. Dogs are not allowed in this beach of Valdelagrana. The police does not put a problem but please take care of the site, do not use chairs or awning to keep coming without problems.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - CA-3113
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - CA-3113
description: Large picnic area, with tables and barbecues. Easy access even to large motorhomes. No problem to stay the night, the guarda civil makes several rounds a day. Do not hesitate to move forward on the path to get away from the road a little. Possibility to get in the shade towards the bottom of the area, under the tall pines, or in the sun in the first very wide part, depending on the season. Very quiet at night. Animated during the day on weekends. No service. Garbage cans and a glass dumpster are available at the entrance. Please leave the premises clean.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle de la Luz
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle de la Luz
description: Good parking to spend the night, quiet and on the beachfront. There is ample parking on the sides, to leave the AC. In the background, facing the sea, there are large squares as well. Gratuitous.

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
description: Just a normal service / gas station along the Autovia del Sur in direction South to Cadiz. Motorhomes can fit, they have toilets and a little shop. No fuzz but doable when in need.

title: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
title_short: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
description: Emptying and filling service at BP gas station. This is in the Cádiz-Seville direction. In the other direction there is another point with the same services. I guess we'll have BP to thank for that. I wish all gas stations had the same idea.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1B Calle del Litoral
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1B Calle del Litoral
description: Parking free for all types of vehicles. No services. Good for visiting the beach, quiet and tranquil for the night but expect to be on your own.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking lot along the street. Next to the park. No prohibition signs that I saw. Large bins for sorted rubbish. beach shower. For us it was just a stopover and didn't stay overnight.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 9 Calle Puerto Serrano
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 9 Calle Puerto Serrano
description: Site Dunas de San Anton: Nice parking facing the sea, with nice beach. Can accept large motorhomes (7.5 m). Bike path accessible from the left of the car park by a slope or steps.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2A Calle Escoven
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2A Calle Escoven

Free access to the pool, within the limit of the capacity of the Bungalows and Apartments.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 35 Calle Puerto Serrano
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 35 Calle Puerto Serrano

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 94 Avenida de la Muralla
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 94 Avenida de la Muralla
description: Great place on a beautiful sandy beach. Parking under trees available. Several restaurants along the beach. Beach shower and toilet available. Toilet has defined opening hours (see notice on site). It is best to get a parking space here very early or in the evening, as it is heavily occupied by bathers.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 4 Plaza Sánchez Romate
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 4 Plaza Sánchez Romate
description: Quiet during the day, although there are several bars nearby. It's a parking lot, it's very crowded, arrive early or late. I don't know I can get anything.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Bergantín
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Bergantín
description: Great place next to the sea. Maybe try to avoid weekends (loud people) and high season (too crowded).

title: (11510) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road
description: Esplanade paved next to the Renfe station. It does not have services but it is a quiet place to stop and spend the night. Possibility of walking through the Park of Los Toruños, pine on the other side of the road that is accessed by the walkway there.

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road / Estación Servicio Alegría
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road / Estación Servicio Alegría
description: Respol - service station with water

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - A-381
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - A-381
description:
Restaurant service station, sink, showers, WC, parking and gas station, very good music, bakery 24/24.
The car park is not so noisy. For showers you can get the key in the restaurant. At the restaurant the food is excellent.  There is water also. Wifi free and excellent.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 9 Paseo de María Auxiliadora
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 9 Paseo de María Auxiliadora
description:
A car park with services in the area, a few minutes away you can visit the city and make a route around the bay.
The zone is the one used on the day of the city fair.

Approximately in the middle of the parking lot there is a building block with 4 drinking water taps.

In summer you have to pay attention to the sprayed "toilet" to fill up the water. There are all services. A connection with an external thread is required for water.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 11 Avenida de Méjico
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 11 Avenida de Méjico
description: Laundry with 3 washing machines and 2 dryers

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 27D Calle Séneca
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 27D Calle Séneca
description:
Nice parking, next to medical center. Very calm at night. There is shadow from 6 pm next to the bush.
People don't mind as long as you keep place clean and don't park on the disabled path(next to the building).
Little bar, in the front. You can use the bathroom there.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 3 Calle Concepción
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 3 Calle Concepción
description: Parking with faucets, centrally located on the same promenade next to a small beach that has water with tides ideal for visiting and eating for its bars, has a beach bar right next to the spectacular spa and toilet, although it is necessary to wait for the afternoon to erase the parking

title: (11510) Puerto Real - Carretera de Circunvalación
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - Carretera de Circunvalación
description: Wide parking area very close to the highway. Very flat, there is a supermarket and a bar very close. There is a path that can be done by bicycle or on foot that communicates with San Fernando

title: (11510) El Pinar - 6D Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11510) El Pinar - 6D Paseo Marítimo
description: Free parking day and night, quiet area, I sleep even with the van door open .. it's next to a small beach that has everything to please ... here there is always room

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 15 Calle Paraguay
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 15 Calle Paraguay
description: Place next to the beach to spend the night. Frequented by fishermen during the evening, discreet. Along a road with some traffic at night (not much noise). There are showers and fountain, currently closed. There is a nice long walk where people exercise, bike, walk dogs. Beautiful sunsets with views of Cádiz.

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 5 Calle Paraguay
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 5 Calle Paraguay
description: Calle Paraguay to Puerto Real - Cádiz - Spain. Next to the San Pedro River

title: (11520) Rota - A-491
description: Van washing facility with portal and LPG filling station. Spacious and quiet area with a bar-restaurant with daily menus. With a 72 hour parking permit.

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - Unnamed Road
description: Parking under the Pepa bridge, next to a factory. I put this car park especially for the beach that is following the path where dogs are allowed. The coordinates of the access to the beach are (36.5283057, -6.2431275). Remember to keep the place clean and take your pets' droppings with you. Possibility of fishing too.

title: (11519) Puerto Real - 1A Calle Perú
title_short: (11519) Puerto Real - 1A Calle Perú
description: 5 min of water per 1 euro by the gas station

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda -

title: (11620) Jédula - 13 Calle Beatriz Cáceres Castillo
title_short: (11620) Jédula - 13 Calle Beatriz Cáceres Castillo
description: To spend the night without problems, very quiet area. He has neither water nor electricity.

title: (11620) Jédula -
title_short: (11620) Jédula -
description: The town hall has set up a loading and unloading point. Always use good judgment and leave it as you would like to find it. Keep in mind that the town festivals are on the first weekend of June, so those 2 weeks cannot be used.

title: () Cádiz - Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: () Cádiz - Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Parking in the port of Cadiz (Punta San Felipe). 10 minutes from the center by bike. No problem staying overnight. There is a chiringuito that offers luxury dining and has bathrooms outside (open during chiringuito hours)

title: (11520) Rota - 6 Plaza del Triunfo
title_short: (11520) Rota - 6 Plaza del Triunfo
description: Water tap behind the bus stop. Some workers from the Rota City Council have told us that it can be used.

title: (11520) Rota - 130D Avenida San Fernando
title_short: (11520) Rota - 130D Avenida San Fernando
description: Self service laundry very comfortable and clean, you can not park at the door but nearby there is free parking, right next to the bus station.

title: (11520) Rota - 120T Avenida San Fernando
title_short: (11520) Rota - 120T Avenida San Fernando
description: Free clay parking 24/24. No services. Not for sleeping. Unsupervised but quiet. In the summer there are people who try to ask for money for parking by posing as municipal staff. Don't pay, you can call the police, come right away, know about this traffic.

title: (11004) Cádiz - 25 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: (11004) Cádiz - 25 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Ideal car park for overnight stays, except on the eve of bank holidays (bottle). Regulated by parameters from 9am to 9pm Monday to Sunday. Maximum 3 hours. 6m vehicle length is officially too long, since the rear is already on the pavement and the front is on the road! Unfortunately very disturbing as disco visitors were active until the morning and 5am

title: (11520) Rota - 8 Calle Escayolistas
title_short: (11520) Rota - 8 Calle Escayolistas
description: Quiet street parking next to Malandar craft beer brewery. Great beer and great people.

title: (11004) Cádiz - 4 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: (11004) Cádiz - 4 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Parking open 24 hours a day and monitored in the port area. No services. Very advantageous motorhome rate for 24 hours (note that vans, vans and other converted vehicles are excluded). If the motorhome occupies 2 places, the price is doubled. Very tight right angle turn at the access barrier. Please note: very noisy disco evening from Saturday to Sunday, all night long.

title: (11520) Rota - 30 Avenida de la Libertad
title_short: (11520) Rota - 30 Avenida de la Libertad

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Camino de las Monjas
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Camino de las Monjas

title_short: (41749) El Cuervo - 35b Calle Fernando Cámara Gálvez

title: (41749) El Cuervo de Sevilla -
title_short: (41749) El Cuervo de Sevilla -
description: Double car park of the Laguna Tollón Bird Observatory - Mirador la Mina. At the top we have a beautiful view but there is a very slight slope, and at the bottom there is a second flat parking lot. Both are gravelled and easily accessible. Depending on the direction of the wind you can hear the AP4 motorway a little but nothing disturbing. Please keep this place clean!

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Avenida de la Constitucion
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Avenida de la Constitucion

title_short: (11520) Rota - 1 Calle Santiago Rusiñol

title: (11400) El Cuervo de Sevilla -

title_short: (41749) El Cuervo - 7 Calle Emilia Pardo Bazán
description: Residual streets of a small and cozy town with good gastronomy and good combination. Lighted and quiet area. I advise buying village bread. I recommend

title: (11520) Rota - 22 Avenida de la Diputación
title_short: (11520) Rota - 22 Avenida de la Diputación
description: Large municipal parking space with no facilities. Easy access to the beach (5 min promenade through a small forest of pines). Playground nearby, closest supermarket 400m.

title: (41749) El Cuervo - 15 Calle Francisco Trujillo
title_short: (41749) El Cuervo - 15 Calle Francisco Trujillo
description: On our way Gibraltar to Portugal we found this empty but very nice Laundrette.  There’s parking round the square

title_short: (11007) Cádiz - 2 Plaza de la Constitución

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 6 Calle Barrón
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 6 Calle Barrón
description: Washer and dryer with 8 and 18kg next to the main entrance of the Dia Maxi. There are enough parking spaces there except Wednesday because there is a very large weekly market next door.

title: (11520) Rota - 57 Lugar Laguna del Moral
title_short: (11520) Rota - 57 Lugar Laguna del Moral
description: It is a parking lot, in front of the police. We spent the night 2 nights and nothing happened and the police were in front of us, we were controlled.

title: (11008) Cádiz - 4 Calle Virgen del Perpetuo Socorro
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 4 Calle Virgen del Perpetuo Socorro
description: Free parking along this street and in the area. You get to the center immediately and being next to the gas station there was always someone attentive.

title: (11007) Cádiz - 1 Brunete
title_short: (11007) Cádiz - 1 Brunete
description:
15 minutes from the old center.
Free place, we stayed there all day.
More suitable for a van, as the street is not hugely wide.

title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Carretera de Chipiona

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Camino Arroyo de la Puya
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Camino Arroyo de la Puya
description: Parking to go to the beach in Bonanza, Sanlucar de Barrameda.  There is a SHELL petrol station nearby and a bakery up the road as well as restaurants.  There is the old Castillo that’s nice to visit as well (often covered with teenagers and cats though).  Beautiful spot. There can be a lot of rubbish left but hoping if more tourists come it’s an incentive for the local government (ayuntamiento de Sanlucar) to clean up the place !

title: (11008) Cádiz - 5C Avenida Fernández Ladreda
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 5C Avenida Fernández Ladreda
description: Blue zone parking 9am-9pm right on the beach. Max 3 hours.

title: (11520) Rota - 23 Avenida de la Diputación
title_short: (11520) Rota - 23 Avenida de la Diputación
description: Public toilet with shower in the small botanical garden (only during the park's opening hours), not far from the car park (approx. 2 km) that is designated as a mobile home parking space.

title: (11002) Cádiz - 5 Calle Campo de las Balas
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 5 Calle Campo de las Balas
description:
Day and night parking
in Cadiz

title: (11002) Cádiz - 22I Avenida Campo del Sur
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 22I Avenida Campo del Sur
description: Because all the parking lots were far from the center, we decided to park here. It is an avenue with views of the sea and blue zone (for a fee). We parked for the night and we had no problem sleeping there. In the morning we took out the time ticket and enjoyed Cádiz since we had the Cathedral only 5 min away.

title: (11008) Cádiz - 52 Avenida Andalucía
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 52 Avenida Andalucía
description: Paid from 9-21. Easy to find spots.

title: (11002) Cádiz - 5A Calle Campo de las Balas
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 5A Calle Campo de las Balas
description: Parking at the end of the island at the castle with a magnificent view of the ocean and the Sans Sebastia castle. Very expensive, no service, only guarded parking. Showers with free hot water are available on the beach.

title: (11002) Cádiz - 7 Avenida Duque de Nájera
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 7 Avenida Duque de Nájera
description: Cadiz City Council public showers open from June to September. Schedules see photo

title: (11002) San Jose - 6 Avenida Duque de Nájera
title_short: (11002) San Jose - 6 Avenida Duque de Nájera
description: The best placed paid park in the city. 24 hour security. In front of the beach. Come at night because it gets full. Near city center on foot, near the beach and good place to park in windy days. Tv is not very good. No pets area!

title: (11009) Cádiz - 4 Avenida María Auxiliadora
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 4 Avenida María Auxiliadora
description: The edge of the beach has become completely chargeable; it is the only place 100m from the beach and 10 minutes by bike from the old center to be free… about twenty parking spaces without noise at night. For vans only.

title: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
description: It is an esplanade in front of the Yacht Club on La Casería beach, with a capacity of at least 10 AC. It is illuminated at night by street lighting. There is a children's playground next door. The views over the bay are worth it. At 100 m is the WC module of the beach. The toilets are locked, but outside there are the typical showers to wash off the sand from your feet. There are two very nice restaurants to dine on fish and other seafood.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 38D Avenida Bajo de Guía
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 38D Avenida Bajo de Guía
description: Parking 200m from the sea, Bajo de Guia tolerated at night, behind the Ice Factory with some shadows in front of the Doñana hotel in the "Las Carlotas" park there is a fountain with drinking water where you can get water with a jug when I went I had a hose As seen in the photo.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 53 Calle Magallanes
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 53 Calle Magallanes
description: LA CASERIA BEACH. Quiet and perfect place to spend the day and spend the night. There is a small fishing village but it is uninhabited and there are also restaurants next door where you can eat good fish from the land. Quiet place to spend the day and pecnotate, next to a restaurant to eat well and at a good price

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 34 Avenida Bajo de Guía
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 34 Avenida Bajo de Guía
description: Parking space next to chiringuito and beach. Medium size camper fits into parking space when there is room at the rear. Some shade is provided by trees.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 37 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 37 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
description: Large parking lot next to mechanical workshops (ADACCA) Fairly flat earth parking lot not far from Mercadona. Entrance a bit tight but great place afterwards. There is a lavender shop not far away at 26 avenida Marconi...

title: (11009) Cádiz - 22 Avenida Amílcar Barca
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 22 Avenida Amílcar Barca
description: Level parking. Opposite there is a footpath, a cycle path, a promenade and the beach. 30 min walk from Cadiz Cathedral and its center. Bars and restaurants nearby. No service. Shower 300m in each direction of the beach.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 595 Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 595 Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
description: Many places (about thirty) at the entrance to the peninsula. Very practical to deposit the CC and leave immediately. Repsol station 1km away for all services. City center easily accessible by bike thanks to the cycle paths present from the start.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 163 Avenida Quinto Centenario
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 163 Avenida Quinto Centenario
description: El Sur automatic laundry, recently installed, 3 washing machines and 4 dryers with possibility of increasing the time. washing includes detergent, fabric softener and active oxygen. very satisfied! no wifi. possible to park nearby (wide avenues). automatic coin change

title: (11100) San Fernando - 10 Calle Santo Ángel
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 10 Calle Santo Ángel
description: Place to spend day and night motorhome

title: (11009) Cádiz - 26 Avenida Marconi
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 26 Avenida Marconi
description: Top laundry! 4 washing machines (12 and 16kg for 6 and 7 euros 3 tumble dryers for 3 euros) quick program, clean place

title: (11520) Rota - 3 Avenida de Los Corrales
title_short: (11520) Rota - 3 Avenida de Los Corrales
description: Pinar de la Almadraba, cerca de los Corrales de Rota, monumento natural.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Avenida de las Piletas
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Avenida de las Piletas
description: Wide avenue and adjacent streets where you can park to visit the city.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 14 Plaza Virgen de Loreto
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 14 Plaza Virgen de Loreto
description: Small laundry called OpenBlue with 2 washing machines (15 & 19kg) and 2 dryers (19kg). Place is clean and owner very friendly. You can also bring your own detergent if you want. The owner even rinsed the machines beforehand so that the smell of the normal detergent and softeners is gone.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 41 Avenida de las Piletas
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 41 Avenida de las Piletas
description: Esplanade controlled by "gorrillas" and very quiet. Five minutes from the historic center.

title: (11520) Rota - 13 Avenida Punta Candor
title_short: (11520) Rota - 13 Avenida Punta Candor
description: Free parking next to the road, no service, the beach about 5 minutes walk. There is 50m of possibility to empty gray and black water and refill for free as a camper site, although it is very dirty and very small.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 999 Carretera Polvorines de Militares
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 999 Carretera Polvorines de Militares
description:
Nice landscape, quiet area, weekends and with good weather very crowded by the 2 restaurants that are in the area, ideal area for paddle surfing.
It is a good car park in case you are passing by to eat or spend the morning, but not to spend more time

title: (11520) Rota - 114 Avenida Punta Candor
title_short: (11520) Rota - 114 Avenida Punta Candor
description: Area with drainage of black and gray water. Next to the beach. Generally busy, although there are many more motorhomes parked in the surroundings. Little noise at night.

title: (11520) Rota - 65 Avenida de la Diputación
title_short: (11520) Rota - 65 Avenida de la Diputación
description: Large, gravelled, night-lit parking lot. Next door is a Spanish restaurant. At night it is quiet to stay here. The city is easy to reach by bike. If you are on good terms, you can combine this with a long walk on beautiful walkways through the park and along the beach overlooking the bridge near Cadiz.

title: (11520) Rota - 359 Paseo Almadraba
title_short: (11520) Rota - 359 Paseo Almadraba

Un endroit très tranquille nous avons passé la nuit avec une autre fourgonnette. Il y a un point d eau potable qui sert aux locaux.  le seul moins les poubelles sont à côté mais bon on regarde la mer de l autre côté.

title: (11011) Cádiz - D Avenida Alcalde Manuel de la Pinta

title: (11520) Rota - 365 Paseo Almadraba

title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 19 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia

title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Av. Alcalde Sánchez Cossío
description: Place along the road. the places being all taken on the other park4night car park we continued and found this location with plenty of space available and a bus stop right in front which allows you to take line 5 to the center.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 20A Avenida Periodista Beatriz Cienfuegos
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 20A Avenida Periodista Beatriz Cienfuegos
description: Automatic laundry inside the same Repsol gas station

title: (11011) Cádiz - 1516 Calle Puerto Real
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 1516 Calle Puerto Real
description: Parking place where you can leave the motorhome for an indefinite time. It is not guarded, but it is a place where theft does not appear to occur, at least not until now.

title: (11520) Rota - 188 Lugar Tarayuelas
title_short: (11520) Rota - 188 Lugar Tarayuelas
description: One of the best places on the coast of Rota, grassy, quite flat and close to the beach. Just a little bumpy on the access road, but not much.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 375 Carretera de la Jara
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 375 Carretera de la Jara
description: Mixed parking along the park road overlooking the sea Not recommended for motorhomes with trailers or heavy goods vehicles No service

title: (11100) Puerto Real - 64 Calle de la Dorada
title_short: (11100) Puerto Real - 64 Calle de la Dorada
description: Drinking water in Petrol&Go Gas Station. Kindly ask the stuff for refill. We refueled diesel and spot the water tap. Asked the stuff if we can use it, and they let us.

title: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
description: Unpaved Splanada we have slept without any problem. It is an alternative to the parking lot if the police do not allow you to sleep or it is full. very quiet space, we spent the night phenomenal.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Calle Algodonales
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Calle Algodonales
description: Very quiet cul-de-sac parking, fair spaces

title: (11520) Rota - 9 Agua Dulce
title_short: (11520) Rota - 9 Agua Dulce
description: We spent two nights here, it is a quiet place with views of the sea, there were few motorhomes, in fact one night there were only two of us. Is one of my favorites in Cádiz

title: (11520) Rota - 23 Agua Dulce
title_short: (11520) Rota - 23 Agua Dulce
description: Small parking lot, a bit dirty, but if the garbage is collected, even if it is not ours, it would be a site 10. 20 meters from the beach. Very quiet. At night only the sound of the sea.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 4 Paseo Virgen del Rocío
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 4 Paseo Virgen del Rocío
description: Free parking in front of shopping center. Entry for parking In the end of the streat. The first entry have a limit of 2.2m and the other dont have!

name: Camping Playa Aguadulce
title: (11520) Camping Playa Aguadulce
title_short: (11520) Camping Playa Aguadulce
description: Solid campsite with fairly small pitches. Large mobile homes (longer than 7m) hardly fit in the pitches. Reasonable sanitary facilities, a bit old, but well maintained. The nearby military airfield can hardly be heard and is only rarely frequented. Beautifully close to the sea, with private beach access. Again and again permanent campers and locals on isolated plots, which is why it can get a little louder on weekends, even late in the evening. There is also a small playground, a restaurant and a small, well-stocked supermarket.

title: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
description:
Parking behind a school. In Carnival there were many housing vehicles. Due to the height difference with the road, it is quite quiet and the squares are very level. Five minutes away is the urban bus 1. On the day that there were more vehicles, an informal man with a yellow vest appeared who I suppose was asking for money (a gorilla), but he did not approach us.


In a quiet place and it gave me a feeling of security.

name: Camper Park Sanlúcar
title: (11540) Camper Park Sanlúcar
title_short: (11540) Camper Park Sanlúcar
description: The motorhome area looks great with all services available, electricity on all pitches. Very spacious pitches of 60 m² and flat ground, each pitch has a piece of artificial grass. family atmosphere.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera
description: Water point with small thread tap, in the GP service station just after the washing rolls. The faucet is leaking but the flow is correct.

address.street: 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera

title: (11100) San Fernando - 26 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 26 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
description: It is a spacious place to park and spend the night. The city center is a ten-minute walk away, there is a gas station, a few meters away, where it is possible to stock up on drinking water.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 3A Calle Carpinteros
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 3A Calle Carpinteros
description: Parking next to the Bahía Sur shopping center and next to the sports facilities. Quiet although somewhat noisy. Good for a night

name: Casa Bosque
title: (11138) Casa Bosque
title_short: (11138) Casa Bosque
description: NLY FOR VANS, NOT CAMPER VANS. Contact before you come. 6 individual plots, with private space and shade, very quiet place in nature. A perfect place to relax, with hot showers, a covered relaxation area and a beautiful shared garden. Be part of our project focused on sustainability, respect for the environment and recycling,

title: (11100) San Fernando -
title_short: (11100) San Fernando -
description: Public parking in the upper part of the Bahia Sur shopping center in San Fernando, just on the ground floor, restaurants, supermarkets, and just 50 meters away from a walk with views of the city of Cádiz, very quiet and quite spacious, highly recommended for an overnight stay.

title: (11520) Rota - 1 Calle Carla de Orleans
title_short: (11520) Rota - 1 Calle Carla de Orleans
description: Day and night classic parking spaces for vans of 6m maximum. Quiet residential area 100m from Playa Ballena, long and wide beach of fine sand. Trash cans and outdoor showers nearby. Quiet night.

title: (11549) Farm colony La Algaida -
title_short: (11549) Farm colony La Algaida -
description: We slept one night. Entrance to Doñana. Road with many potholes and edges on the main track. No problems at night. At dawn and movement of vehicles and people going to the crops. Garbage cans nearby. Picnic area. The GC passed by in the morning and didn't even stop to say anything. Not camping, yes overnight.

title: (11550) Arriates - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11550) Arriates - Unnamed Road
description: Area recreativa Pinar De La Villa. i didn't see any sign of no camping or no parking overnight, i spent 2 night there in July with noone even on a Sunday afternoon, it's also look very clean compared to other recreational area in Spain, just some dog barking. there is a water tap, rubbish bin around and picnic tables, you can park near the table and there is plenty of space and shade. LEAVE NO TRACE!

title: (11520) Rota - 27 La Ballena
title_short: (11520) Rota - 27 La Ballena
description: Parking by the beach, quiet in winter.

title: (11520) Rota - 12 Lugar Aguadulce
title_short: (11520) Rota - 12 Lugar Aguadulce
description: Place to  spend the day on the beach, without services.Ideal for spring days, summer is a place for Sunday and everything is very crowded.
